title: Osh Casino Review for Canadian Players 2025

intro.text: Osh Casino launched in 2021 but truly hit its stride in early 2024 when the operator refocused on Canada and integrated a coast-to-coast payments suite. The site is owned by OSH Casino Group LTD., and operates under License No. [ALSI-202502032-FI1] issued by the Government of the Autonomous Island of Anjouan, Union of the Comoros. In today’s Osh Casino review, we discuss all the platform’s features and benefits for Canadian players.

apply the Osh Casino promo code.

Deposit Methods.text: Funding your account at Osh Casino is straightforward and fee-free. Here are the available payment methods:

items: Interac e-Transfer remains the headline option, processing within seconds and reflecting as CAD without conversion.
Visa and Mastercard cards for those who prefer traditional banking methods.

Deposit Methods.text: Additionally, you can use other e-wallets like EcoPayz, AstroPay, MiFinity, and Flexepin. Every method has a minimum deposit requirement of C$20-C$25, depending on the payment option.

Withdrawal Methods.text: Osh Casino is a modern platform, and it offers convenient state-of-the-art solutions for winnings withdrawals. You can either cash out your rewards using Interac e-transfer, or switch to crypto, and enjoy lightning fast transactions within seconds to your TRC20, LTC, TRX, Ethereum, or other crypto wallets.

items: Instant CAD deposits via Interac, eZeewallet, and Apple Pay.
Weekly 15% cash-back on slot losses with low wagering,

Games Available to Play at Osh Casino.text: Osh Casino currently hosts several thousand real-money titles. Let’s talk about them in more detail.

Slot fans will recognize the heavy hitters – Lady Wolf Moon, Majestic King, and Wild Tiger – alongside new Canadian favourites such as PG Soft’s Diner Frenzy Spins. The providers list reads like an industry awards sheet: BGaming, Betsoft, NetGame, Kalamba, and way more.

You can sort games by popularity, new releases, bonus-buy availability, and even themes, like fishing games. Moreover, the gaming library is regularly updated, so you can be among the lucky players who can enjoy new releases.

If you’re seeking something more unique, Osh Casino offers a whole dedicated section of crash games. Here, you can find popular titles like Aviator, Crasher, Turbo Mines, Totem, and much more. Try your luck and enjoy your winnings within seconds.

Live casino content streams in 1080p from Spinomenal, Tom Horn, InOut, and other providers. From classical roulettes and baccarat to unique options like Sic Bo and different poker variations, Osh Casino offers enough choices to satisfy even the most picky players.

Progressive hunters will appreciate over thirty jackpot slots. Santa’s Jackpot, The Secret of Ali Baba, and Frost Queen Jackpots are only a few of many titles that can bring you significant rewards. You can enjoy them immediately after the successful Osh Casino login, or check the RTP and volatility in demo versions without risking your bankroll.

Osh Casino Bonuses and Promotions.text: Casino bonuses are probably one of the most important features that characterize the casino. At Osh Casino, players can count on many generous rewards right after registration.
For newbies, the platform offers a huge welcome package that brings up to C$2,222 and 222 free spins. The bonus is split for the first four deposits:

items: 1st Deposit – 100% up to C$450 + 60 FS on one of five popular slots from Pragmatic Play.

Osh Casino Bonuses and Promotions.text: To receive the reward, you need to make a deposit of at least C$1,5. Also, every reward has a x40 wagering requirement.
If you prefer to play using crypto deposits, the casino has a unique offer for you. At your first four deposits, you can get:

items: 1st deposit – get a 100% bonus match of up to C$500 + 60 FS.
2nd deposit – 75% up to C$777 and extra 51 FS.
3rd deposit – 50% up to C$900 and 51 FS.

Osh Casino Bonuses and Promotions.text: If you already have an account at Osh Casino, you can count on plenty of other rewards. For example, every Monday, you can get up to 250 free spins on popular slots. All you need to do is just make a minimum deposit of C$20 on the first day of the week, and activate your reward in the bonus section.

Like any other reward, the Lucky Monday bonus has its conditions. First of all, you can only access it after making the initial four deposits. The amount of free spins you get depends on your deposit:

The bonus has a x40 wagering requirement and is valid for 3 days from the moment you acquired it. Free Spins are available for Book of Cats, Big Bass Splash, or Book of Dead slot, depending on the amount of your deposit.
Mid-week, regular players at Osh Casino can receive a 55% match bonus up to C$200. To get this offer, you need to deposit at least C$30 on Wednesday.

Another weekly reward for regular players becomes available every Friday. Just make a deposit of at least C$30 or more, and grab the generous package of 50% match bonus up to C$250 and an extra 50 free spins.

This reward is available every week from Friday to Sunday. It also comes with an x40 wagering condition. Also, keep in mind that there are some games that do not qualify for this bonus. It includes live casino games, table games, jackpots, games that are already part of other promotions, and all the games that are excluded from bonuses.

If you like to play big, this reward is for you. Make a deposit of at least C$451, and receive a 50% bonus match of up to C$2,000. Keep in mind that this reward is only available for new players, and only applies to your first deposit.

Happened to have an unlucky week? No worries! With Osh Casino, you’re safe. Just enjoy your favorite games from Monday to Sunday, and get a 15% cashback on your losses after that. The bonus comes with a very low x10 wagering requirement, so you can easily get your winnings back.

Support.text: Customer support runs 24/7 via live chat and email. A searchable Help Centre includes 120 short articles, each tagged by theme, making self-service surprisingly effective. Agents can switch to French upon polite request.

Osh Casino FAQ.text: Does Osh Casino accept Interac e-Transfer for both deposits and withdrawals?

Yes. Interac e-Transfer is integrated directly into the cashier. Deposits post almost instantly, and once your identity is verified, withdrawals usually arrive within 30 minutes. No fees apply, and limits span C$20–C$7,500 per transaction maximum.
Is there currently an Osh Casino no deposit bonus available to Canadians?

Unfortunately, right now, there aren’t any Osh Casino no deposit bonus offers available. However, it might change, since the platform often updates the list of promotions. Keep notifications on and check the promotions page regularly to grab your lucky bonus.
Can I play Osh Casino online games in demo mode without registering?
Absolutely. Nearly all slot and table games offer demo credits before sign-up. Click the Demo toggle in the game thumbnail.
What are the wagering requirements for the welcome bonus?
The standard requirement is x40 the bonus amount. Meeting turnover on high-RTP slots accelerates clearance, but progressive jackpot stakes never count toward wagering.
Does the Osh Casino app support offline play?
No. Because real-money outcomes depend on live server seeds and regulatory logging, an internet connection is mandatory.
